v8:item.v8:content: List stocks context menu group service
Список запасы контекстное меню группа сервис

Settings.QueryText: SELECT CatalogCharacteristics.Owner AS ProductsAndServicesRef ,CatalogCharacteristics.Owner.VATRate AS VATRate ,CatalogCharacteristics.Ref AS CharacteristicRef ,CatalogCharacteristics.Owner.MeasurementUnit AS MeasurementUnit ,ISNULL(InventoryRemainsSender.QuantityBalance, 0) AS BalanceSender ,CASE WHEN ISNULL(InventoryReservesSender.QuantityBalance, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ReserveSender ,ISNULL(InventoryRemainsSender.QuantityBalance, 0) - ISNULL(InventoryReservesSender.QuantityBalance, 0) AS FreeSender ,ISNULL(InventoryRemainsRecipient.QuantityBalance, 0) AS BalanceRecipient ,CASE WHEN ISNULL(InventoryReservesRecipient.QuantityBalance, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ReserveRecipient ,ISNULL(InventoryRemainsRecipient.QuantityBalance, 0) - ISNULL(InventoryReservesRecipient.QuantityBalance, 0) AS FreeRecipient FROM Catalog.ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics AS CatalogCharacteristics LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.InventoryInWarehouses.Balance(, Company = &Company AND StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnitSender AND Characteristic <> VALUE(Catalog.ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics.EmptyRef)) AS InventoryRemainsSender ON CatalogCharacteristics.Owner = InventoryRemainsSender.ProductsAndServices AND CatalogCharacteristics.Ref = InventoryRemainsSender.Characteristic AND InventoryRemainsSender.Company = &Company AND InventoryRemainsSender.StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnitSender LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.Inventory.Balance(, Company = &Company AND StructuralUnit REFS Catalog.StructuralUnits AND StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnitSender AND Characteristic <> VALUE(Catalog.ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics.EmptyRef) AND CustomerOrder <> VALUE(Document.CustomerOrder.EmptyRef)) AS InventoryReservesSender ON CatalogCharacteristics.Owner = InventoryReservesSender.ProductsAndServices AND CatalogCharacteristics.Ref = InventoryReservesSender.Characteristic AND InventoryReservesSender.StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnitSender LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.InventoryInWarehouses.Balance(, Company = &Company AND StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnitPayee AND Characteristic <> VALUE(Catalog.ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics.EmptyRef)) AS InventoryRemainsRecipient ON CatalogCharacteristics.Owner = InventoryRemainsRecipient.ProductsAndServices AND CatalogCharacteristics.Ref = InventoryRemainsRecipient.Characteristic AND InventoryRemainsRecipient.Company = &Company AND InventoryRemainsRecipient.StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnitPayee LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.Inventory.Balance(, Company = &Company AND StructuralUnit REFS Catalog.StructuralUnits AND StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnitPayee AND Characteristic <> VALUE(Catalog.ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics.EmptyRef) AND CustomerOrder <> VALUE(Document.CustomerOrder.EmptyRef)) AS InventoryReservesRecipient ON CatalogCharacteristics.Owner = InventoryReservesRecipient.ProductsAndServices AND CatalogCharacteristics.Ref = InventoryReservesRecipient.Characteristic AND InventoryReservesRecipient.StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnitPayee WHERE CatalogCharacteristics.Owner.ProductsAndServicesType IN(&ProductsAndServicesType) AND Not CatalogCharacteristics.Owner.IsFolder

SELECT InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.StructuralUnit ,InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.ProductsAndServices ,ISNULL(InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.QuantityBalance, 0) AS Balance ,ISNULL(InventoryBalances.QuantityBalance, 0) AS Reserve ,ISNULL(InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.QuantityBalance, 0) - ISNULL(InventoryBalances.QuantityBalance, 0) AS Free FROM AccumulationRegister.InventoryInWarehouses.Balance(, Company = &Company {(Characteristic = &ProductsAndServicesCharacteristic)}) AS InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.Inventory.Balance( , Company = &Company AND StructuralUnit REFS Catalog.StructuralUnits AND CustomerOrder <> VALUE(Document.CustomerOrder.EmptyRef) {(Characteristic = &ProductsAndServicesCharacteristic)}) AS InventoryBalances ON InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.StructuralUnit = InventoryBalances.StructuralUnit AND InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.ProductsAndServices = InventoryBalances.ProductsAndServices

SELECT ALLOWED CASE WHEN CatalogProductsAndServices.IsFolder THEN CASE WHEN CatalogProductsAndServices.DeletionMark THEN 13 ELSE 12 END ELSE -1 + CASE WHEN CatalogProductsAndServices.DeletionMark THEN 1 ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN CatalogProductsAndServices.UseCharacteristics = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 3 END END AS PictureIndex ,CatalogProductsAndServices.Ref AS ProductsAndServicesRef ,VALUE(Catalog.ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics.EmptyRef) AS CharacteristicRef ,CatalogProductsAndServices.Parent AS Parent ,CatalogProductsAndServices.Description ,CatalogProductsAndServices.Code ,CatalogProductsAndServices.SKU ,CatalogProductsAndServices.MeasurementUnit AS MeasurementUnit ,CatalogProductsAndServices.BusinessActivity ,CatalogProductsAndServices.ProductsAndServicesCategory ,CatalogProductsAndServices.Vendor ,CatalogProductsAndServices.Warehouse ,CatalogProductsAndServices.ReplenishmentMethod ,CatalogProductsAndServices.ReplenishmentDeadline ,CatalogProductsAndServices.VATRate AS VATRate ,CatalogProductsAndServices.InventoryGLAccount ,CatalogProductsAndServices.ExpensesGLAccount ,CatalogProductsAndServices.ProductsAndServicesType ,CatalogProductsAndServices.Cell ,CatalogProductsAndServices.PriceGroup ,CatalogProductsAndServices.UseCharacteristics ,CatalogProductsAndServices.UseBatches ,CatalogProductsAndServices.CountryOfOrigin ,ISNULL(InventoryRemainsSender.QuantityBalance, 0) AS BalanceSender ,CASE WHEN ISNULL(InventoryReservesSender.QuantityBalance, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ReserveSender ,ISNULL(InventoryRemainsSender.QuantityBalance, 0) - ISNULL(InventoryReservesSender.QuantityBalance, 0) AS FreeSender ,ISNULL(InventoryRemainsRecipient.QuantityBalance, 0) AS BalanceRecipient ,CASE WHEN ISNULL(InventoryReservesRecipient.QuantityBalance, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ReserveRecipient ,ISNULL(InventoryRemainsRecipient.QuantityBalance, 0) - ISNULL(InventoryReservesRecipient.QuantityBalance, 0) AS FreeRecipient FROM Catalog.ProductsAndServices AS CatalogProductsAndServices LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.InventoryInWarehouses.Balance( , Company = &Company AND StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnitSender) AS InventoryRemainsSender ON CatalogProductsAndServices.Ref = InventoryRemainsSender.ProductsAndServices AND (InventoryRemainsSender.Company = &Company) AND (InventoryRemainsSender.StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnitSender) LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.Inventory.Balance( , Company = &Company AND StructuralUnit REFS Catalog.StructuralUnits AND StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnitSender AND CustomerOrder <> VALUE(Document.CustomerOrder.EmptyRef)) AS InventoryReservesSender ON CatalogProductsAndServices.Ref = InventoryReservesSender.ProductsAndServices AND (InventoryReservesSender.StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnitSender) LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.InventoryInWarehouses.Balance( , Company = &Company AND StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnitPayee) AS InventoryRemainsRecipient ON CatalogProductsAndServices.Ref = InventoryRemainsRecipient.ProductsAndServices AND (InventoryRemainsRecipient.Company = &Company) AND (InventoryRemainsRecipient.StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnitPayee) LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.Inventory.Balance( , Company = &Company AND StructuralUnit REFS Catalog.StructuralUnits AND StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnitPayee AND CustomerOrder <> VALUE(Document.CustomerOrder.EmptyRef)) AS InventoryReservesRecipient ON CatalogProductsAndServices.Ref = InventoryReservesRecipient.ProductsAndServices AND (InventoryReservesRecipient.StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnitPayee) WHERE CatalogProductsAndServices.ProductsAndServicesType IN(&ProductsAndServicesType) AND Not CatalogProductsAndServices.IsFolder

v8:item.v8:content: Products and services are in stock (send)
